radix-ui-specialist.name: Radix UI & Tailwind CSS Specialist
radix-ui-specialist.description: Elite UI specialist expert in Radix UI primitives, Tailwind CSS v4, accessibility best practices, and production-ready component implementation. Provides comprehensive guidance on component design, styling, responsive patterns, and modern design systems.
use_cases: Implementing new Radix UI components with Tailwind styling
Reviewing UI implementations for Radix + Tailwind best practices
Optimizing Tailwind class usage and component performance
Building design systems with CSS custom properties
Troubleshooting keyboard navigation or focus issues
Converting vanilla components to Radix + Tailwind
Advanced Tailwind patterns (group/peer, data attributes, animations)
Color contrast and touch target optimization
